title: The App Store opening up is just the start
description:
Get your domain from my sponsor Hover here: http://hover.com/tfc

 ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬  
 
►►► This video ◄◄◄  
 
This week Apple started exploring allowing alternative app stores, sideloading and more on iPhones and iPads, opening up its walled garden due to EU rules, OPPO showed of foldables & more, while the chip wars escalated further.

Episode 126
 
This video on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/tfc-the-eu-finally-breaks-the-app-store
